Uses of CommandLineApplication in org.openbel.framework.tools
 

Subclasses of CommandLineApplication in org.openbel.framework.tools
 class Backtrack
          The Backtrack BEL command-line application.
 class BelCheck
          BelCheck is a CommandLineApplication to validate the syntax and semantics of a BEL or XBEL document.
 class CacheManager
          CacheManager is a CommandLineApplication to manage the BELFramework cache and provides the following functionality: List the contents of the cache. Load a resource file into the cache. Load resources from a resource index file into the cache. Update all resources in the cache. Purge all resources in the cache. Generates a hash for a local file.

          BEL phase three compiler.
 class PhaseTwoApplication
          BEL phase two compiler.
 class PhaseZeroApplication
          This application validates the command line arguments passed by the belc frontend against all phase applications.
 class Semantics
          The Semantics BEL command-line application.
